jobDescription: Data Architect  We have significant funding, a proven entrepreneur who has multiple brand name companies behind him & a business model that will revolutionize our category.  As our Data Architect, you will apply subject matter expertise to collect, refine and model data generated throughout the product life cycle. You will be responsible for architecting data models and building data pipelines to fuel analytics teams across multiple verticals: marketing & user acquisition, marketplace shopping, and financial analytics.What You Will Be Doing
